findings.title: The balanceOf of the TokenVault contract is at risk of being manipulated
findings.description: The TokenVault contract has a mechanism to handle the rebase (or deflation token) which can lead to manipulation of balanceOf.

findings.title: The potential mistake in the library Revest-tHelper
findings.description: The function getLockType returns the human-readable string of a specified lock type. However, there is a mistake that causes the function returns either 'Time' or ''. This may bring error information to the front end.

findings.title: The potential mistake in the Staking contract
findings.description: The _Staking_ contract does not pay the fee to the _Revest_ via `msg.value` and is not on the fee whitelist of the _Revest_ contract.

findings.title: Check the variable fnft.split
findings.description: The variable fnft.split seems to be used to record the times the specified lock can be split. As shown in below code, the variable newFNFT.split is reduced by one for each split, but there is no code to check if it is zero.

findings.title: Merge the two functions, i.e., manualMapRVSTBasic and manualMapWETHBasic
findings.description: There is an implicit assumption in the contracts _RewardsHandler_ and _Staking_ : the `allocPoint` is the same for `wethBasic` and `rvstBasic`. The function `manualMapRVSTBasic` updates the `rvstBasic`, and the function `manualMapWETHBasic` updates the `wethBasic`. It’s better to combine the two functions into one.

findings.title: Remove the useless code I
findings.description: The `globalBalance` variable in the function `rewardsOwed` is not used.

findings.title: Remove the useless code II
findings.description: There are a little useless code: In oracles/UniswapTwapOracleDispath.sol:updateOracle, since the check in line 67, the code from line 94 to 97 is dead code.

findings.title: Make the MetadataHandler contract read-only
findings.description: The finding suggests making the MetadataHandler contract read-only.

findings.title: Address the concern of the centralization design
Update the total allocation point in the manualMap* functions
findings.description: Update the total allocation point in the manualMap* functions to ensure accurate allocation.

findings.title: Make the splitFNFT function compatible with the new design
findings.description: The finding suggests making the splitFNFT function compatible with the new design.

findings.title: Add a check in the batchMint function
findings.description: The `batchMint` function does not verify if the `newSupply` is equal to the sum of `quantities`, which can lead to potential issues. It is recommended to add a check in the `batchMint` function to ensure that the sum of `bals[i]` is equal to the `supplies[i]`.

findings.title: Make sure the Staking contract is on the fee white list of the Revest contract
findings.description: The Staking contract does not pay the fee to the Revest via msg.value. It's recommended to add the Staking contract to the fee whitelist of the Revest contract, otherwise the invocation to the function _staking will be reverted.
